hero_content: Getting quotes for delivery services is easy with Buscargo. All you need to do is quickly fill out a form and competitive quotes will be sent to you by email from our network of more than 2000 trusted drivers. Quotations are usually up to 75% cheaper than standard delivery services in Portugal and all Buscargo couriers are evaluated for your peace of mind.
hero_form_desc: We make shipping big things cheaper and easier by helping customers directly connect with suppliers who have extra space in their vehicles.
several_jobs_desc: Buscargo provides you with access to hundreds of customers and new delivery jobs published every day. Signing up to Buscargo is completely free and there are no delivery fees. This fee is added to the budgeted amount. Whether you are looking for full loads, partial loads or return loads, Buscargo has it all. Find jobs along similar routes you've planned, minimize wasted capacity and maximize your profits.
solidary_desc: Help us to help those who need it most, we make solidarity deliveries for you. Your help is precious and is just a click away.
best_prices_desc: Buscargo finds the best shipping prices for you and your business.
testimonial_1_text: I am very satisfied with the work of Buscargo, I recommend it.
testimonial_2_text: Friendly and helpful driver. The parts arrived in good condition. I recommend.
testimonial_3_text: I can only thank you, everything went very well, it was a purchase of 8 chairs from Braga, to Sesimbra, 5 stars Mr Jo√£o was impeccable. I only have to say good value for money. I will use it again.
homepage_msgmodel_para1: Your job is live and drivers are already looking at the job. Please continue set up to avoid missing out.
homepage_msgmodel_para2: Here are your login details for future refrence:
homepage_driver_btn: For more info as a driver click here
homeimagesec: Did you know that jobs with images attached are 80% more responsive? Upload your image now or post your job without image and upload it later
